what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: goal hercpanorama provide common set tools wrangling analyzing CSV outputs Panorama reports.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install development version hercpanorama GitHub :

what: Make a named vector of capture expressions from one of regular expressions. — as_captures
title: Make a named vector of capture expressions from one of regular expressions. — as_captures
text: Use blank names expressions want match, capture.

title: Make a named vector of capture expressions from one of regular expressions. — as_captures
Make a named vector of capture expressions from one of regular expressions. — as_captures
text: .regexes <chr> vector capturing expressions .labels <chr> optional, names capturing expression.

title: Make a named vector of capture expressions from one of regular expressions. — as_captures
text: vector expressions, may named capture groups.

title: Make a named vector of capture expressions from one of regular expressions. — as_captures

what: Parse Panorama file names into their component fields. — filenames_to_tibble
title: Parse Panorama file names into their component fields. — filenames_to_tibble
text: Parse Panorama file names component fields.

title: Parse Panorama file names into their component fields. — filenames_to_tibble
Parse Panorama file names into their component fields. — filenames_to_tibble
text: .filenames <chr> full paths basenames Panorama files. .tz <db> optional, timezone files downloaded .

title: Parse Panorama file names into their component fields. — filenames_to_tibble
text: tibble six columns: File, School, Population, Report, Period, Datetime

title: Parse Panorama file names into their component fields. — filenames_to_tibble
